explains: adj. 不令人满意的；不满足的；不符合要求的

sentences.en: The film's ending is an unsatisfactory cop-out.
sentences.cn: 那部电影的结尾是个不令人满意的回避。

sentences.en: There are also, of course, people who interview extremely well, but are later found to be very unsatisfactory employees.
sentences.cn: 当然，也有面试表现非常好的人，但后来发现是非常不令人满意的员工。

sentences.en: The present system of funding for higher education is unsatisfactory.
sentences.cn: 目前高等教育的经费体制并不令人满意。
